    å¿…è¦ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®install

    command

    sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y
sudo apt install -y curl docker.io lynx

    minikubeã®install

    command

    curl -Lo minikube https://storage.googleapis.com/minikube/releases/latest/minikube-linux-amd64
chmod +x minikube
sudo mv minikube /usr/local/bin/

    å‚è€ƒã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆ

    kubectlã®install

    command

    curl -LO "https://dl.k8s.io/release/$(curl -LS https://dl.k8s.io/release/stable.
chmod +x ./kubectl
sudo mv ./kubectl /usr/local/bin/kubectl
kubectl version --client

    serviceèµ·å‹•(nginx)

    èµ·å‹•ã•ã›ã‚‹manifestãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«

    nginx-deployment.yaml

    apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx:1.19.3
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: nginx-service
spec:
  selector:
    app: nginx
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 80
      targetPort: 80
  type: NodePort

    å®Ÿè¡Œãƒ­ã‚°

    $ kubectl apply -f nginx-deployment.yaml
deployment.apps/nginx-deployment created
service/nginx-service created

    èµ·å‹•å¾Œç¢ºèª(nginx)

    7. NAMES: ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠã®åå‰ã€‚ã“ã®åå‰ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠã‚’è­˜åˆ¥ã—ãŸã‚Šæ“ä½œã—ãŸã‚Šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®å ´åˆã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠã®åå‰ã¯minikubeã§ã™ã€‚

    ã“ã®docker psã®å‡ºåŠ›ã¯ã€MinikubeãŒãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ãƒã‚·ãƒ³ä¸Šã§Dockerã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦Kubernetesã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚’èµ·å‹•ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¤ºã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚Minikubeã¯ã€Dockerã®kicbaseã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’åŸºã«ã—ã¦ã€ã‚·ãƒ³ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®Kubernetesã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    serviceèµ·å‹•(centos)

    èµ·å‹•ã•ã›ã‚‹manifestãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«

    centos-deployment.yaml

    apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: centos-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: centos
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: centos
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: centos
        image: centos:latest
        command:
        - "/bin/bash"
        - "-c"
        - "while true; do sleep 3600; done"

    å®Ÿè¡Œãƒ­ã‚°

    $ kubectl apply -f centos-deployment.yaml
deployment.apps/centos-deployment created

    èµ·å‹•å¾Œç¢ºèª(centos)

    $ kubectl get pods -l app=centos
